page.title: 07The Lions Club
page.content: The Lions Club is for men only and it mainly exists to give a service to the{community}and to{less fortunate {people.}In our district Lions Club there are about forty members. You may join by invitation of a Club member. There are no premises, as such, but club members meet twice a month at the Hassocks Hotel. They mainly raise money for local organizations, individuals, an Eye Camp in India, water wells abroad and the Medical Alert foundation in Britain. The Club raises money for charities through jumble sales, stalls at fetes and door to door collections. It organizes many events like sponsored walks. It does much good work in our local area.
